00045 // TODO: optimize UV sets by making indexed list with duplicates removed
00046 GeometryExporter::GeometryExporter(COLLADASW::StreamWriter *sw, const ExportSettings *export_settings) : COLLADASW::LibraryGeometries(sw), export_settings(export_settings) {}

00049 void GeometryExporter::exportGeom(Scene *sce)
00050 {
00051     openLibrary();
00052 
00053     mScene = sce;
00054     GeometryFunctor gf;
00055     gf.forEachMeshObjectInScene<GeometryExporter>(sce, *this, this->export_settings->selected);
00056 
00057     closeLibrary();
00058 }
00059 
00060 void GeometryExporter::operator()(Object *ob)
00061 {
00062     // XXX don't use DerivedMesh, Mesh instead?
00063 
00064 #if 0       
00065     DerivedMesh *dm = mesh_get_derived_final(mScene, ob, CD_MASK_BAREMESH);
00066 #endif
00067     Mesh *me = (Mesh*)ob->data;
00068     BKE_mesh_tessface_ensure(me);
00069 
00070     std::string geom_id = get_geometry_id(ob);
00071     std::string geom_name = id_name(ob->data);
00072     std::vector<Normal> nor;
00073     std::vector<Face> norind;
00074 
00075     // Skip if linked geometry was already exported from another reference
00076     if (exportedGeometry.find(geom_id) != exportedGeometry.end())
00077         return;
00078     exportedGeometry.insert(geom_id);
00079 
00080     bool has_color = (bool)CustomData_has_layer(&me->fdata, CD_MCOL);
00081 
00082     create_normals(nor, norind, me);
00083 
00084     // openMesh(geoId, geoName, meshId)
00085     openMesh(geom_id, geom_name);
00086     
00087     // writes <source> for vertex coords
00088     createVertsSource(geom_id, me);
00089     
00090     // writes <source> for normal coords
00091     createNormalsSource(geom_id, me, nor);
00092 
00093     bool has_uvs = (bool)CustomData_has_layer(&me->fdata, CD_MTFACE);
00094     
00095     // writes <source> for uv coords if mesh has uv coords
00096     if (has_uvs)
00097         createTexcoordsSource(geom_id, me);
00098 
00099     if (has_color)
00100         createVertexColorSource(geom_id, me);
00101 
00102     // <vertices>
00103     COLLADASW::Vertices verts(mSW);
00104     verts.setId(getIdBySemantics(geom_id, COLLADASW::InputSemantic::VERTEX));
00105     COLLADASW::InputList &input_list = verts.getInputList();
00106     COLLADASW::Input input(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::POSITION, getUrlBySemantics(geom_id, COLLADASW::InputSemantic::POSITION));
00107     input_list.push_back(input);
00108     verts.add();
00109 
00110     // XXX slow     
00111     if (ob->totcol) {
00112         for (int a = 0; a < ob->totcol; a++)    {
00113             createPolylist(a, has_uvs, has_color, ob, geom_id, norind);
00114         }
00115     }
00116     else {
00117         createPolylist(0, has_uvs, has_color, ob, geom_id, norind);
00118     }
00119     
00120     closeMesh();
00121     
00122     if (me->flag & ME_TWOSIDED) {
00123         mSW->appendTextBlock("<extra><technique profile=\"MAYA\"><double_sided>1</double_sided></technique></extra>");
00124     }
00125     
00126     closeGeometry();
00127     
00128 #if 0
00129     dm->release(dm);
00130 #endif
00131 }
00132 
00133 // powerful because it handles both cases when there is material and when there's not
00134 void GeometryExporter::createPolylist(short material_index,
00135                     bool has_uvs,
00136                     bool has_color,
00137                     Object *ob,
00138                     std::string& geom_id,
00139                     std::vector<Face>& norind)
00140 {
00141     Mesh *me = (Mesh*)ob->data;
00142     MFace *mfaces = me->mface;
00143     int totfaces = me->totface;
00144 
00145     // <vcount>
00146     int i;
00147     int faces_in_polylist = 0;
00148     std::vector<unsigned long> vcount_list;
00149 
00150     // count faces with this material
00151     for (i = 0; i < totfaces; i++) {
00152         MFace *f = &mfaces[i];
00153         
00154         if (f->mat_nr == material_index) {
00155             faces_in_polylist++;
00156             if (f->v4 == 0) {
00157                 vcount_list.push_back(3);
00158             }
00159             else {
00160                 vcount_list.push_back(4);
00161             }
00162         }
00163     }
00164 
00165     // no faces using this material
00166     if (faces_in_polylist == 0) {
00167         fprintf(stderr, "%s: no faces use material %d\n", id_name(ob).c_str(), material_index);
00168         return;
00169     }
00170         
00171     Material *ma = ob->totcol ? give_current_material(ob, material_index + 1) : NULL;
00172     COLLADASW::Polylist polylist(mSW);
00173         
00174     // sets count attribute in <polylist>
00175     polylist.setCount(faces_in_polylist);
00176         
00177     // sets material name
00178     if (ma) {
00179         std::ostringstream ostr;
00180         ostr << translate_id(id_name(ma)) << material_index+1;
00181         polylist.setMaterial(ostr.str());
00182     }
00183             
00184     COLLADASW::InputList &til = polylist.getInputList();
00185         
00186     // creates <input> in <polylist> for vertices 
00187     COLLADASW::Input input1(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::VERTEX, getUrlBySemantics(geom_id, COLLADASW::InputSemantic::VERTEX), 0);
00188         
00189     // creates <input> in <polylist> for normals
00190     COLLADASW::Input input2(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::NORMAL, getUrlBySemantics(geom_id, COLLADASW::InputSemantic::NORMAL), 1);
00191         
00192     til.push_back(input1);
00193     til.push_back(input2);
00194         
00195     // if mesh has uv coords writes <input> for TEXCOORD
00196     int num_layers = CustomData_number_of_layers(&me->fdata, CD_MTFACE);
00197 
00198     for (i = 0; i < num_layers; i++) {
00199         // char *name = CustomData_get_layer_name(&me->fdata, CD_MTFACE, i);
00200         COLLADASW::Input input3(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::TEXCOORD,
00201                                 makeUrl(makeTexcoordSourceId(geom_id, i)),
00202                                 2, // offset always 2, this is only until we have optimized UV sets
00203                                 i  // set number equals UV map index
00204                                 );
00205         til.push_back(input3);
00206     }
00207 
00208     if (has_color) {
00209         COLLADASW::Input input4(COLLADASW::InputSemantic::COLOR, getUrlBySemantics(geom_id, COLLADASW::InputSemantic::COLOR), has_uvs ? 3 : 2);
00210         til.push_back(input4);
00211     }
00212         
00213     // sets <vcount>
00214     polylist.setVCountList(vcount_list);
00215         
00216     // performs the actual writing
00217     polylist.prepareToAppendValues();
00218         
00219     // <p>
00220     int texindex = 0;
00221     for (i = 0; i < totfaces; i++) {
00222         MFace *f = &mfaces[i];
00223 
00224         if (f->mat_nr == material_index) {
00225 
00226             unsigned int *v = &f->v1;
00227             unsigned int *n = &norind[i].v1;
00228             for (int j = 0; j < (f->v4 == 0 ? 3 : 4); j++) {
00229                 polylist.appendValues(v[j]);
00230                 polylist.appendValues(n[j]);
00231 
00232                 if (has_uvs)
00233                     polylist.appendValues(texindex + j);
00234 
00235                 if (has_color)
00236                     polylist.appendValues(texindex + j);
00237             }
00238         }
00239 
00240         texindex += 3;
00241         if (f->v4 != 0)
00242             texindex++;
00243     }
00244         
00245     polylist.finish();
00246 }
00247 
00248 // creates <source> for positions
00249 void GeometryExporter::createVertsSource(std::string geom_id, Mesh *me)
00250 {
00251 #if 0
00252     int totverts = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00253     MVert *verts = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00254 #endif
00255     int totverts = me->totvert;
00256     MVert *verts = me->mvert;
00257     
00258     COLLADASW::FloatSourceF source(mSW);
00259     source.setId(getIdBySemantics(geom_id, COLLADASW::InputSemantic::POSITION));
00260     source.setArrayId(getIdBySemantics(geom_id, COLLADASW::InputSemantic::POSITION) +
00261                       ARRAY_ID_SUFFIX);
00262     source.setAccessorCount(totverts);
00263     source.setAccessorStride(3);
00264     COLLADASW::SourceBase::ParameterNameList &param = source.getParameterNameList();
00265     param.push_back("X");
00266     param.push_back("Y");
00267     param.push_back("Z");
00268     /*main function, it creates <source id = "">, <float_array id = ""
00269       count = ""> */
00270     source.prepareToAppendValues();
00271     //appends data to <float_array>
00272     int i = 0;
00273     for (i = 0; i < totverts; i++) {
00274         source.appendValues(verts[i].co[0], verts[i].co[1], verts[i].co[2]);            
00275     }
00276     
00277     source.finish();
00278 
00279 }
00280 
00281 void GeometryExporter::createVertexColorSource(std::string geom_id, Mesh *me)
00282 {
00283     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&me->fdata, CD_MCOL))
00284         return;
00285 
00286     MFace *f;
00287     int totcolor = 0, i, j;
00288 
00289     for (i = 0, f = me->mface; i < me->totface; i++, f++)
00290         totcolor += f->v4 ? 4 : 3;
00291 
00292     COLLADASW::FloatSourceF source(mSW);
00293     source.setId(getIdBySemantics(geom_id, COLLADASW::InputSemantic::COLOR));
00294     source.setArrayId(getIdBySemantics(geom_id, COLLADASW::InputSemantic::COLOR) + ARRAY_ID_SUFFIX);
00295     source.setAccessorCount(totcolor);
00296     source.setAccessorStride(3);
00297 
00298     COLLADASW::SourceBase::ParameterNameList &param = source.getParameterNameList();
00299     param.push_back("R");
00300     param.push_back("G");
00301     param.push_back("B");
00302 
00303     source.prepareToAppendValues();
00304 
00305     int index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(&me->fdata, CD_MCOL);
00306 
00307     MCol *mcol = (MCol*)me->fdata.layers[index].data;
00308     MCol *c = mcol;
00309 
00310     for (i = 0, f = me->mface; i < me->totface; i++, c += 4, f++)
00311         for (j = 0; j < (f->v4 ? 4 : 3); j++)
00312             source.appendValues(c[j].b / 255.0f, c[j].g / 255.0f, c[j].r / 255.0f);
00313     
00314     source.finish();
00315 }
00316 
00317 std::string GeometryExporter::makeTexcoordSourceId(std::string& geom_id, int layer_index)
00318 {
00319     char suffix[20];
00320     sprintf(suffix, "-%d", layer_index);
00321     return getIdBySemantics(geom_id, COLLADASW::InputSemantic::TEXCOORD) + suffix;
00322 }
00323 
00324 //creates <source> for texcoords
00325 void GeometryExporter::createTexcoordsSource(std::string geom_id, Mesh *me)
00326 {
00327 #if 0
00328     int totfaces = dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00329     MFace *mfaces = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00330 #endif
00331     int totfaces = me->totface;
00332     MFace *mfaces = me->mface;
00333 
00334     int totuv = 0;
00335     int i;
00336 
00337     // count totuv
00338     for (i = 0; i < totfaces; i++) {
00339         MFace *f = &mfaces[i];
00340         if (f->v4 == 0) {
00341             totuv+=3;
00342         }
00343         else {
00344             totuv+=4;
00345         }
00346     }
00347 
00348     int num_layers = CustomData_number_of_layers(&me->fdata, CD_MTFACE);
00349 
00350     // write <source> for each layer
00351     // each <source> will get id like meshName + "map-channel-1"
00352     for (int a = 0; a < num_layers; a++) {
00353         MTFace *tface = (MTFace*)CustomData_get_layer_n(&me->fdata, CD_MTFACE, a);
00354         // char *name = CustomData_get_layer_name(&me->fdata, CD_MTFACE, a);
00355         
00356         COLLADASW::FloatSourceF source(mSW);
00357         std::string layer_id = makeTexcoordSourceId(geom_id, a);
00358         source.setId(layer_id);
00359         source.setArrayId(layer_id + ARRAY_ID_SUFFIX);
00360         
00361         source.setAccessorCount(totuv);
00362         source.setAccessorStride(2);
00363         COLLADASW::SourceBase::ParameterNameList &param = source.getParameterNameList();
00364         param.push_back("S");
00365         param.push_back("T");
00366         
00367         source.prepareToAppendValues();
00368         
00369         for (i = 0; i < totfaces; i++) {
00370             MFace *f = &mfaces[i];
00371             
00372             for (int j = 0; j < (f->v4 == 0 ? 3 : 4); j++) {
00373                 source.appendValues(tface[i].uv[j][0],
00374                                     tface[i].uv[j][1]);
00375             }
00376         }
00377         
00378         source.finish();
00379     }
00380 }

00383 //creates <source> for normals
00384 void GeometryExporter::createNormalsSource(std::string geom_id, Mesh *me, std::vector<Normal>& nor)
00385 {
00386 #if 0
00387     int totverts = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00388     MVert *verts = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00389 #endif
00390 
00391     COLLADASW::FloatSourceF source(mSW);
00392     source.setId(getIdBySemantics(geom_id, COLLADASW::InputSemantic::NORMAL));
00393     source.setArrayId(getIdBySemantics(geom_id, COLLADASW::InputSemantic::NORMAL) +
00394                       ARRAY_ID_SUFFIX);
00395     source.setAccessorCount((unsigned long)nor.size());
00396     source.setAccessorStride(3);
00397     COLLADASW::SourceBase::ParameterNameList &param = source.getParameterNameList();
00398     param.push_back("X");
00399     param.push_back("Y");
00400     param.push_back("Z");
00401     
00402     source.prepareToAppendValues();
00403 
00404     std::vector<Normal>::iterator it;
00405     for (it = nor.begin(); it != nor.end(); it++) {
00406         Normal& n = *it;
00407         source.appendValues(n.x, n.y, n.z);
00408     }
00409 
00410     source.finish();
00411 }
00412 
00413 void GeometryExporter::create_normals(std::vector<Normal> &nor, std::vector<Face> &ind, Mesh *me)
00414 {
00415     int i, j, v;
00416     MVert *vert = me->mvert;
00417     std::map<unsigned int, unsigned int> nshar;
00418 
00419     for (i = 0; i < me->totface; i++) {
00420         MFace *fa = &me->mface[i];
00421         Face f;
00422         unsigned int *nn = &f.v1;
00423         unsigned int *vv = &fa->v1;
00424 
00425         memset(&f, 0, sizeof(f));
00426         v = fa->v4 == 0 ? 3 : 4;
00427 
00428         if (!(fa->flag & ME_SMOOTH)) {
00429             Normal n;
00430             if (v == 4)
00431                 normal_quad_v3(&n.x, vert[fa->v1].co, vert[fa->v2].co, vert[fa->v3].co, vert[fa->v4].co);
00432             else
00433                 normal_tri_v3(&n.x, vert[fa->v1].co, vert[fa->v2].co, vert[fa->v3].co);
00434             nor.push_back(n);
00435         }
00436 
00437         for (j = 0; j < v; j++) {
00438             if (fa->flag & ME_SMOOTH) {
00439                 if (nshar.find(*vv) != nshar.end())
00440                     *nn = nshar[*vv];
00441                 else {
00442                     Normal n = {
00443                         vert[*vv].no[0]/32767.0,
00444                         vert[*vv].no[1]/32767.0,
00445                         vert[*vv].no[2]/32767.0
00446                     };
00447                     nor.push_back(n);
00448                     *nn = (unsigned int)nor.size() - 1;
00449                     nshar[*vv] = *nn;
00450                 }
00451                 vv++;
00452             }
00453             else {
00454                 *nn = (unsigned int)nor.size() - 1;
00455             }
00456             nn++;
00457         }
00458 
00459         ind.push_back(f);
00460     }
00461 }

00463 std::string GeometryExporter::getIdBySemantics(std::string geom_id, COLLADASW::InputSemantic::Semantics type, std::string other_suffix)
00464 {
00465     return geom_id + getSuffixBySemantic(type) + other_suffix;
00466 }

00469 COLLADASW::URI GeometryExporter::getUrlBySemantics(std::string geom_id, COLLADASW::InputSemantic::Semantics type, std::string other_suffix)
00470 {
00471     
00472     std::string id(getIdBySemantics(geom_id, type, other_suffix));
00473     return COLLADASW::URI(COLLADABU::Utils::EMPTY_STRING, id);
00474     
00475 }
00476 
00477 COLLADASW::URI GeometryExporter::makeUrl(std::string id)
00478 {
00479     return COLLADASW::URI(COLLADABU::Utils::EMPTY_STRING, id);
00480 }
